name: Cassandra Naylor
text: Great group of folks.

name: Donna Nicholson
text: Awesome place! 1st time tbere but not the last!@!

name: Tim Waldrep
text: Had a blast. Good people

name: Wolfie Tv
text: Place is LARGE. Bigger than you think when u first walk in. At first you are greeted with a glass box filled with a plethora of different CIGARS. If your not sure of what CIGAR MOOD your in the host is happy to give recommendations. He RECOMMENDED me with Churchill’s last hour cigar after giving me a brief history lesson. His recommendation was right on the MONEY. If you choose to stick around a enjoy your cigar, behind the glass wonder box of cigar is a SPACIOUS LOUNGE where you and friends enjoy a pleasant even

name: Jason Walsh
text: Had a really fun experience here, I learned about cigars, and Alabama. Bottom line was that the staff AND the patrons were all super friendly.  Feeling welcome at a place when you're from out of town is great. If your like cigars and bourbon stop by and find out for yourself!

name: Rebecca Dye
text:
Visited for the first time today, and loved it! Bigfoot was super helpful and gave my husband some sound advice on what to try. I explored the lounge in the back, which was quite handsome.

The entire store is masculine, sophisticated, and quite relaxing. It was pristinely clean, including the restrooms. I highly recommend coming in to shop and to spend some time.

We will be back, sooner rather than later.

name: Mike Williams
text: It is simply the best cigar lounge in the city.....

name: Melvin Ramsey
text: Real nice with their selections.

name: Amanda Atchenson
text: Very nice place. Good prices and a great variety of cigars. Very friendly staff also. The Arturo fuente double chateau is one of my favorites. It's a really good cigar if you prefer a milder cigar. The Arturo fuente king b is a great one also, it's a little stronger but not too bad.

name: LaShandra Hatcher
text: Staff is wonderful and the place is calm and welcoming. They have the best selection in town. Great place to unwind without drama unlike another establishment in town. Great location and close to everything Downtown!

name: Oscar Rodriguez
text: A very nice place with excellent Cigar Selection and amazing customer service 😀!

name: Marvin Wells
text: Perfection.

name: Paul Calhoun
text: What a fantastic place and a breath of fresh air.  The staff is knowledgeable but never pushy f,but never overbearing.  Smoking areas outside, upstairs, and downstairs with televisions everywhere. It's a great place to grab a cigar and watch a game.  A+ highly recommended.

name: Ted Danson
text: Wonderful place to enjoy a cigar or smoke my pipe.  They are friendly and helpful but not pushy.  Other places in town can't compare when it comes to the personnel vitola has brought in.  Top notch cigar selection with lots of seating areas.  Must try when in Tuscaloosa!!!!

name: Greg Wood
text: Had a good experience with John today around 12:30. I had a variety of needs. Pipe, torch, etc... he was very kind and patient with me and got set up real nice!!

name: Conrad Voyles
text: Love this place. Parking sucks though. Best cigar selection in Tuscaloosa.

name: Donkor Hardie
text: Hung out to watch the national championship and had a great time with Dr.Drew. Great location, even better cigars and service.

name: kimberly Hall
text: Great, laid back, clean atmosphere. We will definitely be back👍👌

name: Michael Holmes
text: Great atmosphere. Great cigars. Great service. Jeff was great. All around... great

name: David Clark
text: Good place to meet your friends for a herf. BF and Ron are great employees. Prices are good.

name: Pat Donovan
text: Very relaxed atmosphere with full bar and killer humidor.

name: Arash Soltani-Tehrani
text: A very nice cozy place to smoke cigar with caring staff

name: Ambrose Wiering
text: Nice selection, prices are normal. Place looks great.

name: Baba Yaga
text: Beautiful humidor, and nice selection of cigars. They are finally serving a few types of alcohol. Which coupled with the recent friendlyness of the staff, makes thier rating go up. The smoke eaters are way too loud, they have good music playing but is still drowned out by the excessive amount of smoke eaters and it makes it harder to converse with a buddy. Cant really hear the games being played either. Up stairs tv has no sound and it was dirty, ashes all over ground, bottles everywhere, full ashtrays- this was before 12pm. Only had 1 guy working so this could be atributed to that. But other times it wasnt as bad but not like other places. All the seating is rediculously uncomfortable-hard leather and metal stools- imo not fit for a lounge, more of a come and go place. Hard to find parking which is a deterrent sometimes. Has potential to be a cool place, but they are not there yet

name: Nick Crim
text: They have a beautiful selection of cigars while the staff was very helpful. They have my business from now on!

name: J P
text: Great selection, great atmosphere, very responsive owners and sales people

name: tommy indeed1955@gmail.com
text: One of the best spot in Tuscaloosa

name: Demetria Franklin
text: They the cigar shop in town

name: Sand “沙子”
text: Best in town

name: Donnie Meeks
text: Excellent Service

name: Garrison Olival
text: Never heard of it !

name: Carry Dunkerson
text: Great place, great people

name: James Daughtry
text: I don't remember this place at all

name: Carolyn cox
text: First time I had played in twenty five years. Great experience. Director stayed Ann Richmond stayed on it till found a parter who by  the way  was a good sport and fun to play with. Everyone made me feel at ease. So, if you’ve been away from bridge for a while and considering taking it back up. You should.

name: Dianne Wammack
text: Bridge is such a wonderful game and playing at BDBC is awesome! Whether you are rank beginner or an accomplished, this club has a game for you. Give it a try.

name: Pete Partin
text: BDBC is a great place to play bridge, welcoming and friendly players.

name: Larry Myers
text: Loads of fun and interesting people.

resp.text: Thank you for the testimonial, Larry.

name: Shawnee Dials
text: Very very satisfied! The customer service was outstanding, the environment was clean and welcoming as well. They were exceptionally helpful when it came to my diet and what I could and couldn’t have and still had so many options for me! I could tell they use quality ingredients and not only can you taste it but you can feel it!

resp.text: We appreciate your business and we look forward to serving you in the future.

name: Amanda Howard
text: The service is excellent and so are the shakes! I especially enjoyed the Turtle Cheesecake! They also have tons of flavors for the shakes & teas! Be sure to give these folks a visit!

name: tammy lewis
text:
Had the best experience here. The Owners and Staff
Are so friendly and helpful. They make you feel
Welcome and I will definitely be a regular customer
Here. The Teas and Shakes are outstanding.
Get the Turtle cheesecake shake, So delicious.

name: Bradley smith
text: AMAZING FLAVORS, friendly staff, that WANT you to try things to find out what YOU like! Free samples, this peanut butter shake is as nice to look at as delicious as it is to drink. New favorite place!

name: Wade Tolbert
text: Very nice staff. Loved my drinks!! Boycott StarB(s)ucks! Shop local!! Big big menu.

name: T
text: This place is AWESOME!!! Super friendly atmosphere and staff!! Love the meal replacement shakes , and the loaded teas are amazing! Highly reccomend stopping by and trying it out. My fiance and I travel a lot and found this place on our way to Gulf Shores and have been back numerous times on our trips!! Y'all get over and try it!!!

name: Helen Taylor
text: The selection is very nice. I go for the energy drinks and trust me they are good and energizing....BUT I believe the foundation of every business is the customer service provided....The staff is very welcoming and helpful when explaining the menu and helping you understand the value of what you're getting and putting into your body...I pray many blessings on this business and all connected to it

name: Apil Doutt
text: I love my get up and go loaded tea...and the donut hole shot.  The staff are so helpful and knowledgeable.

name: Beth Korzun
text: Happy to see a vegan protein option on the menu. Clean facility and tastes amazing.

name: Deborah Flournoy
text: Wonderful friendly service, great tasting shakes and tea . Try the donut hole

name: Julye Williams
text: Super sweet and helpful owners!

name: Kayla Harrell
text: Additiced to the beauty teas come get ur loaded teas . shakes . or coffee

name: Heather Smith
text: Absolutely love this new tea spot in Mobile !!

name: Patrick Springer
text: Very friendly and knowledgeable place. High end selection of accessories, cigars and humidors. Reasonably priced considering what is available. Love it!

name: Sean Krupa
text: Great cigar store!! People here are super friendly, stock is always really good, and they get some rare cigars and as well as LCA cigars.

name: Francis Sager
text:
Comfortable lounge with a friendly staff that welcomed a NY bus driver with out hesitation.

Decent selection of cigars, nothing fancy, but clean and comfortable.

name: Sarah Zimmerman
text: The chairs in back are comfortable and the staff is helpful.

name: marquis pinkston
text: Peaceful & friendly. Great place to chill

name: Michael Norris
text: On this day 09/22/20 the employee denied me business because I did not wear a mask. When I walked in there were other customers in the store not wearing mask and some wearing mask Also, when I first walked in the employee had his masked pulled down around his neck.

resp.text:
Michael,
We ask all customers to wear a mask when they enter the store. This is posted on the front door. Once smoking a cigar it is not required. We politely tried to let you know the policy. We were not trying to give you a hard time.

name: Samuel Sherrod
text: Great shop at an excellent location. Doc helped me pick out some great cigars as I am a cigar novice. On both occasions he invited me back to rap and smoke a stick. I will def be a return customer. I highly recommend novice smokers as well as aficionados to visit.

name: Brandy Wickliffe
text: I went here looking for cigars as a gift, the man working that morning was very helpful and knowledgeable about the products. He recommended something that ended up as a favorite, so mission accomplished. Highly recommended you stop in here.

name: John Randolph
text: Love this shop. Try to visit everytime I come down this way.

name: Carlos Coleman
text: Great place to relax with a nice cigar and good people. Only 1 drawback is closing at 930.

name: Steven Antselevich
text: Really good place to buy cigars. Guys very friendly and knowledgeable, reasonble prices. Much better than buying online. Thanks for being great for several years.

name: keith gordon
text: This has been my cigar shop for over two years,  spending thousands of dollars here and countless hours, but not anymore.  I've had cigars thrown at me, I've  had ashes dumped on my shoulders by the supervisor Doc/Philip. I've talked to management but they seem to have no problem with him or other supervisors at their other locations being rude, offensive, and unfair to paying customers. I refuse to spend my money and time at a place where I'm not respected. If I have to travel 50 miles one way to purchase my cigars at a different establishment I will to keep from returning to  Cigars and More Trussville,  Patton Creek, 280, or Vitola. They don't deserve the 1 star I gave them.

resp.text:
Keith please call me. This is not the way I want things to be.  So sorry this happened.
Harris

name: Charles W. Clark III
text: Great location, great selection, staff super knowledgeable, awesome ambiance.  This is the spot when my friends and i roll into town.

name: Daniel Rodriguez
text: I was here for the first time and was greeted with open arms nice place to be injoring a good ciger nice people God bless them all.

name: Mariodupree
text: I went to Cigars and More the day after purchasing my first pipe set from another cigar shop and I hate that I didn't go there first! I walked in just to poke around and see what was what (because I already had my pipe set remember) and I was immediately drawn in by the atmosphere, friendly staff and how patient he was with all of my questions. The gentleman behind the counter walked me thru a selection of starter pipes, what to look for when purchasing a pipe and what they offered for my future needs. In fact, he was so helpful and informative that after talking to him for a little while it dawned on me that I had been burned (no pun intended) by the shop where I made my initial purchase. It may have beeen textbook salesmanship, I don't know but I ended up buying a new pipe with accessories and he threw in a bag of tobacco of my choice and a cool little box to store it in for free. All of that, and I still came out much cheaper with a better quality pipe than I purchased just the day before. Not only was the staff friendly but the customers who were there, all of which the salesman new by name, drew me in and not only helped me pick out a good starter tobacco but showed me how to pack it correctly and gave me a bag or two of their own to try. I'm sold! Great atmosphere. Great staff and products. Great regular customers! Its Cigars and More for me from now on.

name: Joseph C Roach
text: Always , always no pressure . Just a great place. Buy a stick, sit down and enjoy if you like. Love this place.

name: Emma Parsons
text: The guy who helped me was great! He took into account what I was looking for and helped me pick some great cigars for my fiancé. Unfortunately I didn't catch his name. I highly recommend this store!

name: Andrew P
text: I went there to buy my first pipe and the guy there was extremely helpful. He didn't rush me at all or make me feel like I was wasting his time. Also, he answered all questions I had without trying to  make me feel like an idiot (We've all come across those people). He pointed things out in the shop that I might want to check out and didn't try to up sale me from the type of pipe I knew I wanted. There were a few regulars there. I know this because he knew all of them on a first name basis (That's how you treat customers). I really like this shop and plan on being back. I left with a new pipe, some tobacco, a pipe tool, a pipe cleaner, and he threw in a box to keep everything together... all for under $50 after tax. Yeah... I'll definitely be back.

name: Blake Barnwell
text: Not as good as it once was. Last time I was in was 2 years ago. A lot has changed...! Overall still a good place to chill and smoke you a cigar and drink a beer.

resp.text: I am sorry your experience was not as great this time. Please give us another shot!

name: brandon brooks
text: Great selection and price but no place to sitnd enjoy your stick. Plus I dont like being stalked in the Humidor.

resp.text:
Brandon,
So sorry you didn’t have a five star experience. We strive to have great customer service in the humidor but never want to stalk! Also be sure to check out our great lounge in the back of the shop behind the humidor. It is a little hidden but very comfy!

name: tony wicz
text: Super friendly and helpful. Seems a little pricey but the Mgr turned me on to a cigar that is the best I've had. Will stop in again on my way through.

name: Wade Bryan
text: Doc is awesome, he knows his cigars. Everyone in the place makes you feel like family. We love this place when we are in town

name: Marquis C Jones Sr.
text: The Best In Alabama

name: Stark
text: The guys here are always friendly and very helpful.  Great selection.

name: Vernell Burden
text: Nice people that work there a very cool and laid back atmosphere the employees answered any questions that I had.

name: Mindy Lambert
text: Such a great variety! They are all very nice and helpful

name: Willie Berry
text: Friendly atmosphere,helpful staff,and  a warehouse of multiple choices.

name: Kartr Higgins
text: Fantastic selection and there is always really nice people around.

resp.text:
(Translated by Google) Thanks Katr!

(Original)
Thanks Katr!

name: Rachel Ann Sanders
text: Good prices & great selection of cigars

name: Lilith Presson
text: Very welcoming place.

name: Derrin Miller
text: Nice and cozy,  everyone is friendly

name: David Marks
text: Great pipe tobacco.

name: Joe V
text: Friendly clowns and good hamburgers.

name: Skipper Malcom
text: Mobile's best kept secrets are kept inside.

name: John Sipperley
text: Good time good folks.

name: Joel Minto
text: Not open to the public. But it's next to a grave yard.

name: Timothy Hoover
text: Totally epic
